A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: STAR WAR: The Last Jedi is not just a bad Star Wars film\, it is a bad film PERIOD. Nonsensical Plot\, Forgettable Characters\, Untalented \"Actors\"\, Garbage Story\, Plot-Holes Everywhere\, Anticlimactic Ending\, Cringey Dialogue\, and the WORST Mary-Sue Main Character I've ever seen. An abortion of a Star Wars movie. DO NOT waste your money on this movie. Disney has clearly bought and paid for the positive reviews from \"critics\"\, because the OBVIOUS divide between viewers and critics is laughable. STAR WARS is now a GARBAGE franchise. Good Job Disney\, you pandering A-Holes.
